author: wrowe
msg: apr_os_pipe_put() (where is the _file in that symbol name?) registers
no cleanup - so enforce APR_FILE_NOCLEANUP to force apr_file_inherit_[un]set

author: wrowe
msg: Keep screaming about these bogus assumptions until they disappear.

author: wrowe
msg: /me reverts an entirely moronic patch - this was a macro declaration
and the exact sequence is critical.

author: wrowe
msg: Simply move a declaration to make the CLOEXEC patch much easier to read.

author: wrowe
msg: We register no cleanups for files with APR_FILE_NOCLEANUP - reflect that
by returning APR_EINVAL if the user attempts to toggle the inherit state.
